xmlText.p: First Period_1, Toronto, Marner 11, 1:55. 2, Toronto, Matthews 26 (Nylander), 9:25. 3, Toronto, Marner 12 (Kadri, Marleau), 11:30. Penalties_Gardiner, TOR, (holding), 13:24; Ottawa bench, served by DiDomenico (too many men on the ice), 14:10; Borowiecki, OTT, (holding), 17:16.
Second Period_4, Ottawa, Oduya 3 (Chabot, Stone), 8:32. 5, Toronto, van Riemsdyk 22 (Marner, Rielly), 13:51 (pp). Penalties_Hainsey, TOR, (tripping), 9:55; Pyatt, OTT, (holding), 12:58.

Third Period_6, Ottawa, Brassard 14 (Phaneuf, Stone), 0:45. 7, Toronto, Kadri 18 (Marner, Marleau), 2:29. 8, Ottawa, Dzingel 15 (Pageau, Borowiecki), 13:32. 9, Toronto, Marleau 18 (Marner), 18:38. Penalties_Brassard, OTT, (unsportsmanlike conduct), 19:32; Pageau, OTT, (slashing), 19:57.
Goalies_Ottawa, Anderson 15-17-5 (10 shots-7 saves), Condon 4-9-4 (30-28). Toronto, Andersen 27-15-4 (25-22).
